import { useEffect } from "react"; export const Engagement = ({ sideNavToggle, perfNavToggle}) => { useEffect(() => { sideNavToggle(false) perfNavToggle(true) }) return (

Once you publish your course, come here to learn about your course engagement.

); }; export default Engagement;
